mdRecord.dcterms:title: Frank Lloyd Wright grave marker, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Wright was buried in the Lloyd-Jones family cemetery next to Unity Chapel near Taliesin and Spring Green from his death in 1959 until 1985, when his remains were controversially removed after the death of his third wife and widow, cremated and reinterred in Arizona." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spring_Green,_Wisconsin [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
cemeteries
Wright, Frank Lloyd (American architect, 1867-1959)
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Spring Green, Sauk, Wisconsin, United States
